author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 47-year-old worker, K. Marimuthu, was critically injured in a fire accident at a cracker unit in Thyagarajapuram under Vachakarapatti police station limits on Monday morning.

The condition of the victim, who has been admitted to Sivakasi Government Hospital with 90 per cent burns, is said to be serious, the police said. The accident took place at the fuse dipping room of Radhika Fireworks near Muthalipatti around 9 a.m. Marimuthu was the only worker in the room at that time. Fire and Rescue Services personnel doused the flames. “Production at the unit was not going on when the accident took place after Petroleum and Explosive Safety Organisation, Sivakasi, suspended its licence on Friday. The accident occurred while shifting things from one room to another,” SP P. Aravindan said.
title: One injured in cracker unit blaze
